title: Tyson Fury vs Deontay Wilder on God | theology is everywhere: trash talking prize fighters
description:
the THEOLOGY IS EVERYWHERE series explores the unexpected places in culture where theology is happening.

This weekend there was a big heavyweight championship fight between Tyson Fury and Deontay Wilder. A boxing ring would seem to be an unexpected place to find theology. But even in their braggadocious press conferences, there was theological dialogue happening.
